Title: Tutorial Controls
Description: Tutorial, learn about controlling the game.

Title: Sector 11
Description:
A virus has broken out in Green Vally!
Take control over sector 11 and stop it from spreading!

Title: Sector 7
Description:
The virus is still spreading!
Take over sector 7!

Title: Field #2
Description:
It looks like it's headed towards Energy Farm!
Check out field #2.

Title: Lab 330
Description:
Help Dr Scientist run some simulations with the virus. We need to know more about it.
Let the virus take over.

Title: Field #3
Description:
Dr Scientist has identified the virus as 0f2, when infected Cubers seem to have double the life and energy.
Head over to field #3.

Title: Sector 6
Description:
Energy Farm looks clear. We almost have the vally cleared.
Help out with sector 6.
Length:
A virus has broken out in Green Vally!
Take control over sector 11 and stop it from spreading! aaaaaaaaaaaaa aaaaaaaa aaaaaaaaaaa aaaaaa 2234567421 4121 24421 2132 415 122

Title: Vally St
Description:
The virus has escaped out of sector 2, it's headed towards Bold Town.
Go down Vally ST and intercept it!

Title: Vally St
Description: Good job, now head back towards Green Vally.
